mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (title, memberId, homeNo, content, hit) VALUES (#{title}, #{memberId}, #{homeNo}, #{content}, #{hit})
mapper.select: select * from community order by articleNo asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT c.articleNo AS articleNo, c.title AS title, c.homeNo AS homeNo, c.memberId AS memberId, c.content AS content, c.hit AS hit FROM community c JOIN home h ON c.homeNo = h.no WHERE h.schoolId = #{schoolId} order by articleNo asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
SELECT * FROM community WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') order by articleNo asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
